subject: Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Hurricanes rallied to win 10 times after trailing by two or more goals this season. On Sunday, they stormed back from a 3-1 deficit to defeat the Buffalo Sabres.
snippet: The Hurricanes rallied to win 10 times after trailing by two or more goals this season. On Sunday, they stormed back from a 3-1 deficit to defeat the Buffalo Sabres.
